labels.label: Analyze, transform, route results via Streaming SQL
Find, filter and clean Twitter streams

entry.value: Select msg, unixtime, friends_count , hashtags , listed_count , tweet_id , user_name , favourites_count , source , placename , media_url , retweet_count , user_mentions_name , geo , urls , countryCode , user_url , place , coordinates , handle , profile_image_url , time_zone , ext_media , statuses_count , followers_count , location , user_mentions , user_description From FLOWFILE
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE CAST(retweet_count AS DOUBLE) <= 0 AND CAST(followers_count AS DOUBLE) > 200 AND user_name <> 'Tim Spann' AND UPPER(msg) LIKE '%FLIGHT%'
